metadata.description: Automatically generated contradiction pairs for testing NLI-based contradiction detection

usage_instructions: 1. These pairs can be used to test the NLI contradiction detection module
2. Feed statement_1 as 'prev_assistant_turn' and statement_2 as current answer
3. Check if contradiction_score matches expected_score threshold
5. For pairs labeled 'entailment' or 'neutral', expect score < 0.4

pairs.statement_2: Apple's Q3 2024 revenue was $$95.2B
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Apple's Q3 2024 revenue was $$75.3B
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Apple's Q3 2024 revenue was $$98.4B
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Microsoft revenue declined 5% compared to last year
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Apple revenue declined 3% compared to last year
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Tesla revenue declined 2% compared to last year
pairs.label: contradiction

pairs.statement_1: Apple reported Q3 2024 revenue of $85.8 billion
pairs.statement_2: Apple Inc. achieved $85.8B in Q3 2024 revenue
pairs.label: entailment
pairs.notes: Paraphrase - should NOT be detected as contradiction

pairs.statement_2: Azure grew 31% compared to the previous year
pairs.label: entailment

pairs.statement_2: Diversifying your investments lowers portfolio risk
pairs.label: entailment

pairs.statement_1: Apple reported Q3 2024 revenue of $85.8 billion
pairs.statement_2: Microsoft's cloud services grew 31%
pairs.label: neutral

pairs.statement_2: Portfolio diversification is a risk management strategy
pairs.label: neutral
